name: czkawka
description: Czkawka is a fast, cross-platform tool for finding duplicate files, similar photos, empty folders, and more. It features a CLI and GUI and is designed for efficiency using Rust and multithreading support.
features: Duplicate Detection: Find identical files quickly and accurately. Reclaim wasted storage.
Similar Photos: Identify near-duplicate images intelligently. Clean photo collections.
Empty Folders: Locate and remove unused directories. Organize file systems.
Fast Performance: Rust-powered speed with multithreading. Process large drives quickly.
CLI & GUI: Choose command-line or graphical interface. Flexible usage options.
Cross-Platform: Works on Linux, Windows, and macOS. Universal compatibility.
